item.title: St. John's HC Rick Pitino Eyes 900th Win Against Son Richard in Xavier Showdown
item.description: St. John's coach Rick Pitino will pursue his 900th win on Saturday against Xavier, who's coached by Rick's son, Richard Pitino.
